page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: Railway. Lingfield British Rail Station has an hourly service to Victoria or London Bridge via Oxted and East Croydon to the North and East Grinstead in the south. Many people travel by train to work. Bus. The area is served by 6 London Country bus routes and a Royal Mail Post Bus. There are four taxi/car hire firms in the area. Most people questioned had the regular use of a car, many homes having at least two. Lingfield is on the flight path to Gatwick Airport and on average 14 aeroplanes an hour pass directly overhead. The noise can be disturbing but as the airport provides employment for many local residents people questioned thought this was a nuisance they soon became accustomed to.
